messages.content: I think I told you that I would give you my Marshall Islands address, in case you wanted to send any letters out my way. It's fine if you don't, but I will definitely write back for any letters I get. Thought I'd at least let you know. It's Andrew Kuck; c/o WorldTeach; P.O. Box 627; Majuro, MH 96960; Republic of the Marshall Islands. (The semicolons break up the lines)
